Design a submersible vehicle that can withstand extreme pressure and has advanced sonar and mapping technology to navigate the deep sea.
Create a team of experts in marine biology, geology, and engineering to lead the mission and collect samples and data for research.
Develop a communication system that can transmit data and voice signals through the water to a base station on land.
Use 3D printing technology to create custom equipment and tools for the submersible, such as a robotic arm for collecting samples.
Train the team in emergency procedures and develop a contingency plan in case of any unexpected events during the mission.
